about_the_game:
One moment, and the world changed. The same houses, streets, the same sun in the sky. But they will never be the same again. With the first explosions, the lives of millions of people changed, and you are among them.

Scenarios

Thousands of fates, thousands of stories.
Dive into new plots time after time. Characters, goals, possibilities, everything is different from scenario to scenario. What they all have in common is one terrible event. It affected all of them, but in different ways. It's up to you not only to figure out how but also to influence everything.

The decisions you make will impact the entire gameplay

From the smallest to the largest.

Any, even the most insignificant decisions, can affect your story and possibilities. A series of choices can lead you to completely unexpected places. How to respond in dialogue? When to use an item? Should you take this action now? All of it carries weight!
No one is going to tell you how to resolve the situation, you are on your own to find solutions for all targets.

Explore the map

History on every corner.

At each location, you'll find many interesting places. Are there any traces of someone? What was here before? And what should you do now? Each such place contributes a piece to the overall picture. Explore locations, discover new ones, and more!

Collect useful items

Put everything useful in your pocket.

Collect, use, sell dozens of different items. From food to tools. There's even beer! It's up to you to decide how and where to use all this goodness.

Cook food

Where can you go without a snack?

Cook meals of varying degrees of difficulty. Each of them will give you unique properties with which you can control the story even more.

Keep an eye on your status

Sleep-eat-sleep-eat-sleep-eat-ah-lolable!
Monitor not only your physical needs but also your moral and even social ones. Any slight fluctuations in status can either give you new opportunities or limit you. Anything can be a resource here. Whether it's smiling at a stranger or even time.

Create your own story

It's all in your hands!
Using everything mentioned above and much that hasn't been described, you get a small but vivid story in your hands. It's up to you to decide what it will grow into.

Based on horrifying events

No more tears.
There are things that leave scars on people. There are such scars that stay with entire nations. The pain from them may never fade away. Healing them is not possible either. But we can try to understand. Because if you understand all the pain of a person, then you can truly offer your shoulder and share that burden. Is that something a little person can do?

short_description: Find yourself in the middle of the humanitarian horror of war. You have no weapons, and you are not a soldier. You only have a life and the way you want to survive. Write your story. Maybe you will lose life. Maybe you'll live loose. It all depends on your decisions, which always have consequences.
